reviewText: I enjoyed this as it is a solid basic introduction from a person who communicates well and plays well. Good value!

I have been working with this book for about two months now, and I find it to be a great book for the introduction of Afro-Cuban drumming.  In three words, I love it!  It makes you think of the pattern in so many different ways.  I would suggest this book to anyone who wants to understand this style of drumming.  I would also suggest that the purchaser get her Video on this book, it is a great visual of the concept.
